unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? I once bought a saree for Onam from a website, total headache to return! They made me jump through hoops. Like, did you get a challan for it, or what? Shanti Aunty down the street has a better policy, honestly. It's almost as frustrating as trying to perfect biryani the first time!
